Exception Reason: EBS encryption not required for localnet development environment
Rule Info: The resource creates one or more EBS volumes that have encryption disabled.

Exception Reason: Detailed monitoring not required for localnet development environment
Rule Info: The EC2 instance/AutoScaling launch configuration does not have detailed monitoring enabled.

Exception Reason: Termination protection not required for localnet development environment
Rule Info: The EC2 instance is not part of an ASG and has Termination Protection disabled.
